name: Fortress Theif
description:
For the Mix & Game Jam i picked the themes Rougelike and Stealth.

My idea was to have a game where you sneak into a castle, and steal a item, along the way avoiding guards and looting gold, I was also planning on adding a system where the more noise the player makes the faster there heart would beat and that would attract the guards, and if the player was caught there run would start over

but due to lack of time since i was only able to join on the 2nd day I had to scrap some of the ideas and most of the map.

Below is what i was planning for the map, I was hopping to get at lest half of the map done, but due to lack of time i settled for 5 rooms.
